General.Name: Co-Tech Development
General.Description: Co-Tech Development Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells copper foils in Taiwan and China. The company was formerly known as Co-Tech Copper Foil Corporation and changed its name to Co-Tech Development Corporation in June 2014. Co-Tech Development Corporation was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

1.Name: Ms. Hsueh-Chen  Yeh
1.Title: Financial Officer & Mang. of Corp. Governance Officer
